017package org.parboiled.examples.calculators;
018
019import org.parboiled.Rule;
020import org.parboiled.common.StringUtils;
021import org.parboiled.parser.BaseParser;
022import org.parboiled.parser.Parboiled;
023import org.parboiled.parserunners.RecoveringParseRunner;
024import org.parboiled.support.ParsingResult;
025import org.parboiled.support.ToStringFormatter;
026import org.parboiled.trees.GraphNode;
027import org.parboiled.parserunners.RecoveringParseRunner;
028import org.parboiled.support.ParseTreeUtils;
029import org.parboiled.support.ParsingResult;
030import org.parboiled.support.ToStringFormatter;
031
032import java.util.Scanner;
033
034import static org.parboiled.errors.ErrorUtils.printParseErrors;
035import static org.parboiled.support.ParseTreeUtils.printNodeTree;
036import static org.parboiled.trees.GraphUtils.printTree;
037
038/**
039 * Base class of all calculator parsers in the org.parboiled.examples.calculators package.
040 * Simply adds the public static main entry point.
041 *
042 * @param <V> the type of the main value object created by the parser
043 */
044public abstract class CalculatorParser<V> extends BaseParser<V> {
045
046    public abstract Rule InputLine();
047
048    @SuppressWarnings({"unchecked"})
049    public static <V, P extends CalculatorParser<V>> void main(Class<P> parserClass) {
050        CalculatorParser<V> parser = Parboiled.createParser(parserClass);
051
052        while (true) {
053            System.out.print("Enter a calculators expression (single RETURN to exit)!\n");
054            String input = new Scanner(System.in).nextLine();
055            if (StringUtils.isEmpty(input)) break;
056
057            ParsingResult<?> result = new RecoveringParseRunner(parser.InputLine()).run(input);
058
059            if (result.hasErrors()) {
060                System.out.println("\nParse Errors:\n" + printParseErrors(result));
061            }
062
063            Object value = result.parseTreeRoot.getValue();
064            if (value != null) {
065                String str = value.toString();
066                int ix = str.indexOf('|');
067                if (ix >= 0) str = str.substring(ix + 2); // extract value part of AST node toString()
068                System.out.println(input + " = " + str + '\n');
069            }
070            if (value instanceof GraphNode) {
071                System.out.println("\nAbstract Syntax Tree:\n" +
072                        printTree((GraphNode) value, new ToStringFormatter(null)) + '\n');
073            } else {
074                System.out.println("\nParse Tree:\n" + ParseTreeUtils.printNodeTree(result) + '\n');
075            }
076        }
077    }
078
079}
